description: Display dashboard usage or audit information.

configuration.name: accountId
configuration.title: Account ID
configuration.description: Account ID query will be executed against

configuration.name: query
configuration.title: Query
configuration.description: NRQL query for visualization. Must contain at least 1 dashboard identifier (i.e-guid, id)

configuration.name: dashboardKey
configuration.title: Dashboard Identifier
configuration.description: Unique identifier for dashboard (i.e-source.dashboardId, entityGuid, etc)

configuration.name: enableTimePicker
configuration.title: Enable Time Picker
configuration.description: Allows the use of the time picker when enabled
